page.title: 05TRESAITH, DYFED
page.content: My name is Toby. I am 8 years old. I live in{Cnuc-y-fedwen.}My mummy's name is Linda. My dad's name is Peter. I have 2 sisters and 1 brother. We live near{Tresaith Beach.}My mum goes {shopping at Newcastle Emlyn}and { {Cardigan}. My dad works on a farm. He is a{builder.}My mum is a{vet.}My sisters names are Lucy and Zoe and my bother is called Tom. I go to school at{Glynarthen}at 8.50 and home at 15.20. I have 2 cats and one dog called Brandy. We have 9 fields and a stream, and keep{sheep and}chickens We have 6 vehicles and 2 caravans.{Toby {Jeffery. {
